What resources are available to help me get started with Verus?

There are several guides available to help you get started with Verus. These guides cover topics such as setting up the Verus command-line interface (CLI), setting up Verus Vault, diverting staking rewards to different wallets, claiming refunds from the Verus-Ethereum Bridge, and getting a Verus address.

What are my options for setting up Verus Vault?

You have two options for setting up Verus Vault: you can either use the "Set up Verus Vault (flags)" guide, which provides detailed instructions on setting up Verus Vault using flags, or you can use the "Set up Verus Vault (easy)" guide, which provides an easier setup process.

How can I divert staking rewards to different wallets?

To divert staking rewards to different wallets, you can set up a new wallet address as the reward recipient. This can be done by updating your wallet settings or using a specific command in your wallet software.
